articles.title: UP: Lakhimpur Kheri court sends Alt News co-founder Mohammed Zubair to 14-day judicial custody
articles.description: On Monday, Lakhimpur Kheri police also moved an application in a local court seeking 14 days’ police custody of Mohammed Zubair to question him. The court will hear the plea on July 13.

articles.title: Sri Lanka Speaker takes U-turn, says President Gotabaya Rajapaksa still in country
articles.description: Sri Lanka Speaker Mahinda Yapa Abeywardena said that President Gotabaya Rajapaksa is still in the country. The speaker made a U-turn as he had earlier said that Rajapaksa had fled the country and would return by Wednesday.

articles.title: India to surpass China as most populous country in 2023, U.N. report says
articles.description: India is set to surpass China as the world's most populous country in 2023, with each counting more than 1.4 billion residents this year, a United Nations report said on Monday, warning that high fertility would challenge economic growth.
